main event: An observer reported a sighting of a bright orange triangular object in the sky on April 11, 1967.
interesting points: The object was reported to be 500-600 feet high and rose unexpectedly before disappearing., The object had a white and green light on the bottom., Witnesses noted the object changed colors from orange to red to white during the sighting., The triangular shape became more visible as the object ascended., The sighting lasted approximately 90 seconds and involved multiple observations by the witnesses.
witness description: Two brothers who observed the object while traveling.
